thread.title: TUOLUMNE COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COUNCIL JOB OPPORTUNITY (pic)
thread.title_full: TUOLUMNE COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COUNCIL JOB OPPORTUNITY (pic)

title: TUOLUMNE COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COUNCIL JOB OPPORTUNITY (pic)
text:
TUOLUMNE COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COUNCIL JOB OPPORTUNITY ad date: 10/21/2015 
TUOLUMNE COUNTY TRANSPORTATION COUNCIL JOB OPPORTUNITY TCTC Staff Services Analyst II $21.61 -$26.38 per hour TCTC is seeking a Staff Services Analyst II to analyze, develop and coordinate administrative functions, including preparing and administering budgets, evaluating and developing grant funding sources, planning and conducting feasibility studies for new and existing programs, and other administrative activities. BA degree in business, public administration or a closely related field, and/or 3 years of increasingly responsible administrative, program evaluation, budgeting or marketing experience, preferably in the public sector, including some lead or supervisory responsibilities are required. To see full job description and to apply, visit www.tuolumnecounty.ca.gov Closes 11/11/2015
